name: Lunr
text: Like Solr, but much smaller, and not as bright.

name: ElasticSearch
text: Elasticsearch is a search engine based on the Lucene library. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.

name: Lucene
text: Apache Lucene is a free and open-source search engine software library, originally written completely in Java by Doug Cutting.
